system.description: With a wellspring of magic flowing from their veins and a divine understanding of all magic, the mystic arcanist can reorder magic to suit their will. Whenever you cast a spell that deals damage, you may choose the type of damage that spell deals and the appearance of the spellâ€™s effects. For example, scorching rays made to deal cold damage might look like icicle spears, a fireball that deals radiant damage may appear to be an explosive host of warrior angels, and a lightning bolt that deals psychic damage may be a strange color or accompanied by unnatural howls.
